entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
